Uses of Interface
org.bct.api.Swapper

  • Uses of Swapper in org.bct.api

    Methods in org.bct.api that return Swapper
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Swapper<Future>
    Swappers.futureSwapper()
    Returns a swapper for Future objects that extracts completed results or status information.
    static Swapper<Optional>
    Swappers.optionalSwapper()
    Returns a swapper for Optional objects that unwraps them to their contained values.
    static Swapper<Supplier>
    Swappers.supplierSwapper()
    Returns a swapper for Supplier objects that evaluates them to get their supplied values.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    <T> BasicBeanConverter.Builder
    BasicBeanConverter.Builder.addSwapper(Class<T> c, Swapper<T> s)
    Registers a custom swapper for a specific type.
